products.name: Oreo Cookies
products.description: Chocolate sandwich cookies with vanilla cream.
products.ethical_notes: Oreo is owned by Mondelez, a company flagged in several ethical reports for environmental concerns.

products.name: Pepsi
products.ethical_notes: Mixed ethical record. Accused of water overuse in some regions.

products.name: Coca-Cola
products.ethical_notes: Often involved in controversies related to worker rights and water consumption.

products.name: Tropicana Orange Juice
products.ethical_notes: Generally good reputation; criticized for plastic use.

products.name: Doritos Nacho Cheese
products.ethical_notes: Frito-Lay factories reported for poor labor conditions in some countries.

products.name: Pringles Original
products.ethical_notes: Moderate ethical record; criticism about packaging waste.

products.name: Snickers
products.description: Milk chocolate bar with peanuts and caramel.
products.ethical_notes: Mars has been criticized for child labor concerns in cocoa supply chains.

products.name: Nutella
products.ethical_notes: Controversies over palm oil sourcing and environmental impact.

products.name: Almarai Yogurt
products.ethical_notes: Generally positive; no major global controversies.

products.name: Nadec Milk
products.ethical_notes: Good overall reputation in ethical sourcing.

products.name: Zain Mixed Nuts
products.ethical_notes: Local Palestinian brand; good local ethical reputation.

products.name: Safi Olive Oil
products.ethical_notes: Very positive; supports local farmers.

products.name: Canaan Tahini
products.description: Palestinian tahini made from sesame seeds.
products.ethical_notes: Highly ethical brand supporting fair trade practices.

products.name: Lipton Yellow Label Tea
products.ethical_notes: Unilever faced multiple ethical concerns but improving.

products.name: Rice Basmati Al-Arz
products.ethical_notes: Good local reputation, no major concerns.

products.name: White Sugar Al-Nassr
products.ethical_notes: Neutral ethical record.

products.name: Salt Al-Waha
products.ethical_notes: Neutral ethical record.
